resources.string: I have over six years of experience developing mobile apps for iOS and Android. For the past three years I have worked as an Android developer for Museum of the Bible, and am current serving as the lead developer on the Software team there. While my formal education is not in C.S., I have taken the online equivalents of all core classes in a standard C.S. undergraduate degree. I am seeking a job in the Austin/San Antonio area.

This app was developed by Chris Ruddell from scratch using Android Studio. It incorporates elements from Material Design and Android Architecture Components. Data is loaded at runtime and updated dynamically from an AWS server instance using Retrofit.
